00021 #ifndef CLPP_DETAIL_UNNAMED_PARAMETERS_HANDLER_HPP
00022 #define CLPP_DETAIL_UNNAMED_PARAMETERS_HANDLER_HPP
00023 
00024 #include "parameter.hpp"
00025 #include "parameter_parts_extractor.hpp"
00026 
00029 namespace clpp {
00030 
00033 namespace detail {
00034 
00040 class unnamed_parameters_handler {
00041 public:
00042     unnamed_parameters_handler( const parameters&                     _registered_parameters
00043                                 , const parameter_parts_extractor&    _extractor
00044                                 , const std::string&                  _name_value_separator ) :
00045             registered_parameters( _registered_parameters )
00046             , extractor( _extractor )
00047             , name_value_separator( _name_value_separator ) {}
00048 private:
00049     const parameters&                registered_parameters;
00050     const parameter_parts_extractor& extractor;
00051     const std::string&               name_value_separator;
00052 public:
00053     void operator()( str_storage& inputed_parameters ) const {
00054         if ( no_registered_unnamed_parameters() ) {
00055             return;
00056         } else {}
00057 
00058         for ( size_t i = 0; i < inputed_parameters.size(); ++i ) {
00059             std::string& inputed_parameter = inputed_parameters[i];
00060             if ( this_is_unnamed_parameter( inputed_parameter ) ) {
00061                 handle_unnamed_parameter( i, inputed_parameter );
00062             } else {}
00063         }
00064     }
00065 private:
00066     bool no_registered_unnamed_parameters() const {
00067         return parameter::orders.empty();
00068     }
00069 
00070     bool this_is_unnamed_parameter( const std::string& inputed_parameter ) const {
00071         return !boost::contains( inputed_parameter, name_value_separator )
00072                && this_is_not_name( inputed_parameter );
00073     }
00074     
00075     bool this_is_not_name( const std::string& inputed_parameter ) const {
00076         parameter_const_it it = std::find( registered_parameters.begin()
00077                                            , registered_parameters.end()
00078                                            , inputed_parameter );
00079         return registered_parameters.end() == it;
00080     }
00081 
00082     void handle_unnamed_parameter( size_t inputed_parameter_index, std::string& inputed_parameter ) const {
00083         const size_t inputed_parameter_serial_number = inputed_parameter_index + 1;
00084         parameter_const_it it = std::find( registered_parameters.begin()
00085                                            , registered_parameters.end()
00086                                            , inputed_parameter_serial_number );
00087         if ( registered_parameters.end() != it ) {
00088             const std::string value_of_unnamed_parameter = inputed_parameter;
00089             inputed_parameter = it->short_name + name_value_separator + value_of_unnamed_parameter;
00090         } else {
00091             notify_about_missing_of_parameter_with_serial_number( inputed_parameter
00092                                                                   , inputed_parameter_serial_number );
00093         }
00094     }
00095 
00096     void notify_about_missing_of_parameter_with_serial_number( const std::string& inputed_parameter
00097                                                                , size_t serial_number ) const {
00098         o_stream what_happened;
00099         what_happened << lib_prefix() 
00100                       << "You inputed unnamed parameter '" << inputed_parameter << "' "
00101                       << "with order number " << serial_number << ", "
00102                       << "but there is no parameter with such order number!";
00103         throw std::runtime_error( what_happened.str() );
00104     }
00105 };
00106 
00107 } // namespace detail
00108 } // namespace clpp
00109 
00110 #endif // CLPP_DETAIL_UNNAMED_PARAMETERS_HANDLER_HPP
